daily: Hi bb! Just a reminder that you're doing amazing, and sayang so proud of you for being you. ğŸ’š

extra: It's okay to rest today, bb. You don't have to be productive every single moment. Your worth isn't measured by what you accomplish.
Hey naeburs, you are so much more capable than you give yourself credit for. I see your strength even when you don't.
Princess, bad days don't define who you are. You're still the incredible, kind, beautiful person I fell in love with, always.
Cinta, take it one step at a time today. One breath, one moment, one small victory. That's all you need to focus on right now.
BB, you're allowed to take all the time you need. There's no deadline for healing, growing, or figuring things out. Be patient with yourself.
Baeburs, progress isn't always linear and that's completely okay. Some days you'll move forward, some days you'll rest, and both are important.
Hey princess, you're doing amazing even when it doesn't feel like it. I see you trying, and that effort matters so much.
Naeburs, be gentle with yourself today. Treat yourself with the same kindness and compassion you show to others. You deserve that love too.
Cinta, small steps still count as progress. Every little thing you do today is an achievement worth celebrating. I'm proud of you. ğŸ’š
BB, it's okay to ask for help when you need it. Reaching out doesn't make you weak, it makes you brave and self-aware.
Princess, you don't have to have everything figured out right now. Life is a journey, not a race. Take your time, sayang is here.
Hey baeburs, your feelings are valid, always. You're allowed to feel what you feel without judgment or explanation. I'm here to listen.
Naeburs, take a deep breath. You've got this, even when it feels overwhelming. One moment at a time, bb. ğŸ’š
Cinta, celebrate the small wins today, getting out of bed, eating a meal, taking a shower. Those things matter, they really do.
BB, you're allowed to prioritize yourself and your wellbeing. Saying no to others sometimes means saying yes to yourself, and that's okay.
Princess, it's okay to say no when you need to. Protecting your peace and energy is not selfish, it's necessary and important.
Hey naeburs, you're learning and growing every single day, even on days when it feels like you're standing still. Trust the process.
Baeburs, trust the process, and more importantly, trust yourself. You have everything you need inside you already. ğŸ’š
Cinta, your best is enough, always. You don't have to be perfect or extraordinary. Just being you is more than enough for me.
BB, give yourself credit for showing up today, for trying, for being here. That takes real courage and I'm so proud of you.
Princess, you're allowed to feel tired. Rest isn't giving up, it's giving yourself what you need to keep going. ğŸ’š
Hey naeburs, tough moments are just that moments. They pass. This feeling won't last forever, I promise you.
Cinta, you're not falling behind. Everyone moves at their own pace, and yours is exactly right for you. Don't compare yourself to others.
BB, it's okay to have bad days. They don't erase your progress or make you a failure. You're still moving forward, always. âœ¨
Baeburs, be proud of yourself for the things no one else sees, the battles you fight internally, the fears you face quietly. I see you.
Princess, you're doing the best you can with what you have right now, and that's truly admirable. Sayang is so proud of you. ğŸ’š
Hey cinta, remember that setbacks are not failures. They're just part of the journey. You'll get through this like you always do.
Naeburs, your mental health is a priority, not a luxury. Taking care of yourself is one of the bravest things you can do.
BB, you don't owe anyone an explanation for taking time to heal or rest. Your wellbeing comes first, always. ğŸ’š
Princess, it's okay to not be okay sometimes. You don't have to pretend to be strong all the time, especially not with me.
Baeburs, every day you wake up and try is a victory. Never underestimate the strength it takes just to exist sometimes. âœ¨
Hey naeburs, you're allowed to change your mind, to grow, to evolve. You're not stuck being who you were yesterday.
Cinta, be patient with yourself. Healing takes time, and you're doing better than you think. I believe in you, always. ğŸ’š
BB, you are not your mistakes or your bad days. You're the love you give, the kindness you show, the light you bring.
Princess, sayang is here for you, cheering you on through every step, every stumble, every triumph. You're never alone in this. ğŸ’š
Naeburs, remember that asking for support is a sign of strength, not weakness. Let people help you, let me help you.
Hey cinta, you're worthy of grace and understanding, especially from yourself. Be as kind to yourself as you are to others.
BB, it's okay to take things slow. There's no rush to have it all figured out. Life unfolds in its own time. ğŸŒ±
Baeburs, you're doing so much better than you realize. Sometimes we can't see our own growth until we look back. Trust me, I see it. ğŸ’š
Princess, whatever you're carrying today, you don't have to carry it alone. I'm here to share the weight with you, always.
Hey naeburs, take a moment to acknowledge how far you've come. You've survived every difficult day so far, that's incredible. âœ¨
Cinta, you're allowed to outgrow people, places, and versions of yourself. Growth is beautiful, even when it's uncomfortable.
BB, sayang believes in you even on the days you don't believe in yourself. I see your potential and your beautiful heart. ğŸ’š
Princess, you're not too much or not enough. You're exactly right just as you are. Don't let anyone make you doubt that.
Naeburs, healing isn't linear. Some days will be harder than others, and that's okay. I'll be here through all of them. ğŸ’š
comfort: Hey bb, I need you to know that I'm always here for you, no matter what. On your darkest days, your hardest moments, your most overwhelming times, sayang is right here beside you. You're never alone in this, I promise. ğŸ’š

Naeburs, you've survived 100% of your worst days so far. That's not luck, that's your incredible strength and resilience. You're doing amazing, even when it feels like you're barely holding on. I'm so proud of you for still being here.

Cinta, take a deep breath with me right now. Breathe in slowly... and out. You are safe. You are loved. You are valued beyond measure. Whatever you're feeling right now, it's going to be okay. I'm here holding space for you. ğŸ’š

Princess, if today feels heavy, if the weight on your chest is too much, I wish I could reach through this screen and hold you tight. Since I can't, please hold yourself gently for me. You deserve comfort and tenderness, especially from yourself.

BB, you don't have to be strong all the time. It's okay to let your guard down, to feel vulnerable, to lean on me when you need support. That's what I'm here for. You can rest in my love, it's safe here, I promise. ğŸ’š

Hey baeburs, whatever you're feeling right now is completely okay. Sadness, anxiety, fear, overwhelm, all of it is valid. You don't have to justify or explain your feelings to anyone, including me. I'm just here, accepting you fully as you are.

Naeburs, bad moments don't make you a bad person. Difficult days don't erase your worth. You're still the incredible, kind, loving person I know and cherish. This moment doesn't define you, your heart does. ğŸ’š

Cinta, I see you trying even when no one else does. I see you getting out of bed when it feels impossible. I see you fighting battles no one knows about. I see you, and I'm so incredibly proud of you. You're braver than you know.

Princess, you deserve kindness, especially from yourself. Please talk to yourself the way you'd talk to someone you love, with patience, with gentleness, with understanding. You deserve that compassion, bb. You really do. ğŸ’š

Hey bb, this feeling won't last forever, I promise you. I know it feels endless right now, like you'll never feel okay again, but you will. The sun will break through these clouds. You will laugh again, smile again, feel light again. Hold on for me.

Naeburs, I love you on your good days when you're laughing and everything feels manageable. But I also love you on your hard days when you're struggling and everything feels too much. My love doesn't change based on how you're doing, it's constant, always. ğŸ’š

Cinta, I need you to hear this: you are not a burden. You never were, and you never will be. Your struggles don't make you difficult or too much. They make you human. And I love every part of you, including the parts you think are hard to love.

BB, it's okay to not be okay right now. You don't have to put on a brave face or pretend everything is fine. Not with me. You can fall apart if you need to, I'll help you pick up the pieces. That's what love is. ğŸ’š

Princess, I'm sending you all my love and warmth right now. Imagine me wrapping my arms around you, holding you close, telling you that everything is going to be alright. Because it will be. We'll get through this together, one moment at a time. ğŸ¤—

Hey baeburs, you are so much stronger than you realize. The fact that you're still here, still trying, still breathing despite everything you've been through, that's extraordinary. You're extraordinary. Never forget that.

Naeburs, take all the time you need to heal, to rest, to process. There's no timeline for feeling better. I'm not going anywhere, I'll be right here beside you for as long as it takes. You can count on me, always. ğŸ’š

Cinta, you matter to me more than you know. Your life has meaning and purpose, even on days when you can't see it. The world is better with you in it. I'm better with you in it. Please don't forget how important you are.

BB, I'm so proud of you for getting through this moment, this hour, this day. I know it's been hard. I know you're tired. But you did it. You're still here, and that takes incredible courage. I see you, and I'm proud of you. ğŸ’š

Princess, you are worthy of love, rest, peace, and every good thing this world has to offer. You don't have to earn these things, you deserve them simply because you exist. You are enough, exactly as you are right now.

Hey naeburs, remember that storms don't last forever. The rain will stop. The clouds will part. The sun will shine again. And when it does, I'll be right here with you, holding your hand through it all. Better days are coming, I promise. â˜€ï¸

Cinta, your mental health struggles don't make you broken or damaged. They make you human. And you're handling them with so much grace and courage. I'm in awe of your strength, even when you don't feel strong. ğŸ’š

BB, when your mind is telling you lies, that you're not good enough, not worthy, not lovable, please remember this truth: sayang loves you completely. Every part of you. Always. Those negative thoughts aren't facts, they're just thoughts, and they will pass.

Baeburs, if you're reading this during a panic attack or anxiety spiral, I want you to focus on my words. You are safe. This will pass. Your body is trying to protect you, but you're not in danger. Breathe with me. In... and out. I'm here with you. ğŸ’š

Princess, please don't give up on yourself, even when everything feels hopeless. You've come so far already. You've overcome so much. You have more strength in you than you realize. I believe in you, even when you can't believe in yourself.

Hey cinta, on days when existing feels like too much effort, please know that your presence alone is enough. You don't have to accomplish anything. You don't have to be productive. Just being here, breathing, that's enough. You are enough. ğŸ’š

Naeburs, I know the depression makes everything feel gray and heavy and pointless. But I promise you, there's still color in this world, still beauty, still reasons to hold on. And I'll help you find them again, one small moment at a time.

BB, you're allowed to feel scared, anxious, overwhelmed. Those feelings are valid and real. But please don't let them convince you that you're alone, because you're not. Sayang is here, and I'm not going anywhere. We'll face this together. ğŸ’š

Princess, recovery isn't linear. Some days you'll feel better, some days you'll feel worse. That's normal and okay. Setbacks don't erase your progress. You're still moving forward, even when it doesn't feel like it. I'm proud of you for trying. âœ¨

Hey baeburs, I wish I could take away your pain, carry your burdens, fight your battles for you. Since I can't, I'll do the next best thing, I'll stand beside you through all of it. You don't have to face this alone. I'm here, always. ğŸ’š

Cinta, your life has value and meaning, even on days when depression tells you otherwise. You matter to me. You matter to this world. And I need you here. Please keep holding on, for me, for yourself, for all the beautiful moments still waiting for you.

Naeburs, it's okay to cry. Tears aren't weakness, they're release. Let yourself feel what you need to feel. I'm here to hold space for all of your emotions, the comfortable ones and the painful ones. You're safe to feel everything with me. ğŸ’š

BB, I know it's hard to see right now, but this moment is temporary. You won't feel this way forever. You've gotten through hard times before, and you'll get through this too. And I'll be right here beside you every step of the way.

Princess, please be patient with yourself. Healing takes time. Growing takes time. Recovering takes time. There's no rush. Move at your own pace, and know that sayang will be here supporting you through every single step of your journey. ğŸ’š

Hey cinta, you're doing so much better than you think you are. I know you can't see your own progress, but I can. You're growing, learning, surviving. And that's incredible. I'm so proud of the person you're becoming, even through all this pain.

Naeburs, on your hardest days when you can't see any light, please borrow my hope. I have enough hope for both of us. I believe in your healing, in your strength, in your future, even when you can't. Let me believe for you until you can believe for yourself. ğŸ’š

BB, you are loved. Deeply, completely, unconditionally. Not because of what you do or accomplish, but because of who you are. And who you are is more than enough. You will always be enough for me. Always. ğŸ’š

Princess, I know the world feels overwhelming right now. Everything feels like too much. But you don't have to handle it all at once. Just focus on this moment. This breath. This heartbeat. That's all you need to do right now. One moment at a time, bb.

Hey baeburs, sayang wants you to know that you're not fighting this battle alone. When you're too tired to fight, I'll fight for you. When you can't see the way forward, I'll guide you. When you want to give up, I'll give you reasons to hold on. Together, we've got this. ğŸ’š

Cinta, your depression doesn't define you. It's something you're experiencing, not something you are. You're still the beautiful, kind, amazing person I fell in love with. This darkness is temporary, your light is permanent. I see it even when you can't. âœ¨

Naeburs, please don't apologize for struggling, for having bad days, for needing support. You have nothing to be sorry for. Mental health challenges aren't your fault. I'm here because I want to be, because I love you, because you matter to me. Always. ğŸ’š

BB, I promise you that better days are ahead. Days when you'll feel lighter, when breathing won't feel so hard, when existing won't feel like such a burden. Those days are coming, cinta. Please hold on for them. Hold on for me. Hold on for yourself. ğŸ’š

Princess, when the darkness feels suffocating and you can't see any way out, remember this: you've survived every single difficult day so far. That's 100% survival rate. You're a warrior, bb. And this time will be no different. You'll make it through. I believe in you. âœ¨

Hey naeburs, I love you. Today, tomorrow, always. Through the good times and the hard times. Through your best days and your worst days. Through everything. My love for you is unwavering, unchanging, unconditional. You are safe in my heart, forever. ğŸ’š
